keyword: how many calories in doctor pepper
title: How Many Calories in Dr Pepper?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in doctor pepper (Dr Pepper) per 12 oz can, including carbs, sugars, sodium, and quick diet tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in Dr Pepper?
assumptions: Regular Dr Pepper soda, 12 fl oz (355 ml) can, carbonated soft drink with no added ice or mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, serving size, and formulation; check labels for exact values as recipes can change.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz can of Dr Pepper contains 150 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Diet Dr Pepper (zero sugar)
20 oz bottle instead of 12 oz can
Mix with zero-cal seltzer (half and half)

faqs.q: How many calories in one can of Dr Pepper?
faqs.a: About 150 calories in a standard 12 oz can.

faqs.q: Does Dr Pepper have sugar or carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, 40 g of sugars and 40 g carbs per 12 oz can, all from added sugars.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in doctor pepper?
Are there calories in diet doctor pepper?
faqs.a: Diet Dr Pepper has 0 calories, using artificial sweeteners instead of sugar.

faqs.q: How many calories per 100 ml of Dr Pepper?
